BackstoryDef.title: kidnapped child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was abducted at a young age and raised in captivity. Deprived of proper schooling, [PAWN_pronoun] survived by learning to listen, to obey, and to read the moods of [PAWN_possessive] captors. The experience left [PAWN_objective] wary of others and untrained in most practical skills, but unusually sensitive to peopleâ€™s intentions.

BackstoryDef.title: ideal patient
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was chosen for countless experimental procedures with archite technology. For reasons unknown, [PAWN_pronoun] never rejected an implant, making [PAWN_objective] the perfect subject for radical genetic experiments. The treatments left [PAWN_objective] frail in body, but adapted to pain and unusually tolerant of hardship. Sadly, one of the treatments has resulted in a slowly progressing terminal illness.
